scripts.build-browser: rollup src/main.js --format iife --name "Sully" --file dist/sully-1.0.0.js; uglifyjs dist/sully-1.0.0.js -c -m -o dist/sully-1.0.0.min.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
scripts.build-node: rollup src/main.js --format cjs --name "Sully" --file dist/sully-1.0.0.js; uglifyjs dist/sully-1.0.0.js -c -m -o dist/sully-1.0.0.min.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
scripts.build: rollup src/main.js --format umd --name "Sully" --file dist/sully-1.0.0.js; uglifyjs dist/sully-1.0.0.js -c -m -o dist/sully-1.0.0.min.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
